title: New: Dananananaykroyd – E Numbers
body:
![](http://www.fredperrysubculture.com/bandimages/main/dananananakroyd3.jpg "Danana")If, like us you have been following Scottish rockers Dananananaykroyd’s [twitter](http://twitter.com/#!/dananananaykroy)over the last couple of weeks, you will have noticed that they have indeed finished their sophomore record and are readying it for release. Here we have the first taster of second album material, in the form of free download E Numbers. Continuing in a similar twee punk fashion as their debut LP, there are touches of Fugazi meets Wire, meets Los Campesinos!. That’s a fairly awful description to be honest; anyway, check out and download E Numbers below.

 [Dananananaykroyd – E Numbers](http://soundcloud.com/workit/dananananaykroyd-e-numbers) by [WorkItMedia](http://soundcloud.com/workit)
